Package pt.ist.phylolib.data

Class Context

java.lang.Object
pt.ist.phylolib.data.Context
public final class Context
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the context of the program with the three different data types used.

  • Method Details

    • getDataset

      public Dataset getDataset​(Options options) throws MissingInputException
      Returns and updates the dataset with the given options.

      If there is no dataset option, then returns the previous value for the dataset.

      If the previous value is null, then throws a MissingInputException.

      Parameters:
      options - the options to search for the dataset option
      Returns:
      the dataset read from the options or the previous value
      Throws:
      MissingInputException - if the dataset option is not provided and the previous value is null

    • getMatrix

      public Matrix getMatrix​(Options options) throws MissingInputException
      Returns and updates the matrix with the given options.

      If there is no matrix option, then returns the previous value for the matrix.

      If the previous value is null, then throws a MissingInputException.

      Parameters:
      options - the options to search for the matrix option
      Returns:
      the matrix read from the options or the previous value
      Throws:
      MissingInputException - if the matrix option is not provided and the previous value is null

    • getTree

      public Tree getTree​(Options options) throws MissingInputException
      Reads and updates the tree with the given options.

      If there is no tree option, then returns the previous value for the tree.

      If the previous value is null, then throws a MissingInputException.

      Parameters:
      options - the options to search for the tree option
      Returns:
      the tree read from the options or the previous value
      Throws:
      MissingInputException - if the tree option is not provided and the previous value is null

    • setMatrix

      public void setMatrix​(Options options, Matrix value)
      Writes and updates the matrix with the given options.
      Parameters:
      options - the options to search for the out option
      value - the matrix to write and update

    • setTree

      public void setTree​(Options options, Tree value)
      Writes and updates the tree with the given options.
      Parameters:
      options - the options to search for the out option
      value - the tree to write and update
